about_the_game:
Madness in the Banaverse is a single player platform game that combines action and comedy with a cartoonish style, taking as its protagonist the famous YouTuber “El Bananero”, who provides his voice to give life to the character and the most iconic phrases.

It all begins when the main character is kidnapped by Santa and his henchmen, and during his escape he ends up going through a portal to the multiverse. From there, together with his colleague Andrés Di Bono, they will have to go through the various levels of the Multiverse to escape from a false Santa and his minions.

The goal of the game is to go through the different levels of the multiverse and find a way to return home. To do this, El Bananero and Andrés have to travel through increasingly crazy places full of fake Santa's henchmen. Each level has its own challenges that combine environmental contexts with comedy and action.

The game has more than 11 levels with a variety of environments, each of which follows the concept of madness. Includes places like a drain, an underwater level, a world where cakes are the size of buildings, or even navigating the multiverse with a jet pack.

The game has a variety of enemies and obstacles designed within the theme that the Youtuber addresses in his videos, worked under the creativity of the company to extend and further crazy the concept of the characters, thus bringing challenges such as defeating Santa who uses a Jetpack backpack and a bazooka, or a giant cake that shoots candy, or a Gorilla.

Each level has challenges related to solving puzzles combined with the constant combat against Santa’s henchmen. While it is true that there will be guides and support signs to solve the puzzles, the presence of enemies lurking will be something that makes this game more dynamic, so your allies will be very useful throughout the journey.

The weapons within this game range from the use of throwables, boxing gloves, energy blasters, and to regain health we include things like beer and sausages.
Within the game we will find varieties of characters, objects of use, outfits and many other surprises that will be hidden around.

The game has many surprises hidden within the levels, one of them is the set of skins that allows the player to enjoy an even funnier experience, thinking that if they check carefully, they can end up playing with El Bananero dressed as a crayon.

Warning, this is a game recommended for an adult audience, all the characters present here are fictional and any resemblance to reality is pure and mere coincidence

name: Locuras en el Banaverso

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i3-8145U CPU @ 2.10 GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Madness in the Banaverse is a single player platform game that combines action and comedy with a cartoonish style, taking as its protagonist the famous YouTuber “El Bananero”, who provides his voice to give life to the character and the most iconic phrases.
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, Spanish - Spain*, English, German, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
